config.GunnarFairness.name: Gunnar's Generosity
config.GunnarFairness.description:
How generous Gunnar's prices are starting from
year 2 onwards (more generosity = lower prices).
Generous - ~0.5x prices (close to sell value).
Cheaper - ~0.75x prices.
Default - 1x prices.
Pricier - 1.5x prices.
Unfair - 2x prices.
Set to Generous for a more character-accurate experience.
config.YearOneFairness.name: Year One Generosity
config.YearOneFairness.description: How generous Gunnar's prices are DURING Year 1. This setting has no effects on Item-Specific Generosity.
config.CachePriceModifier.name: Cache Price Modifier
config.CachePriceModifier.description:
The price for caches is modified by this setting,
instead of Gunnar's Generosity.
Generous - 0.8x prices.
Cheaper - 1x prices.
Default - 1.25x prices.
Pricier - 1.5x prices.
Unfair - 2x prices.
Set to Cheaper to negate this modifier's effects.
config.DeluxePotionPriceModifier.name: Deluxe Potion Price Modifier
config.DeluxePotionPriceModifier.descrip:
The price of more expensive potions is modified by this setting,
instead of Gunnar's Generosity.
Generous - 0.5x prices.
Cheaper - 0.75x prices.
Default - 1x prices.
Pricier - 1.5x prices.
Unfair - 2x prices.
Set to Default to negate this modifier's effects.
config.FersekenPeachSaplingModifier.name: Ferseken Peach Sapling Price Modifier
config.FersekenPeachSaplingModifier.desc: The price of Ferseken Peach Saplings is modified by this setting, instead of Gunnar's Generosity. Set to Generous for a more character-accurate experience.
config.WeakRingPriceModifier.name: Weak Ring Price Modifier
config.WeakRingPriceModifier.description:
The price of Weak Rings is modified by this setting,
instead of Gunnar's Generosity.
Generous - ~0.8x prices.
Cheaper - 1x prices.
Default - 1.25x prices.
Pricier - 1.5x prices.
Unfair - 2x prices.
Set to Cheaper to negate this modifier's effects.
config.StoneBrambleBerryEdibility.name: Bramble Berry Edibility
config.StoneBrambleBerryEdibility.descri: How much energy and health is recovered by eating stone bramble berries. (Energy = 2.5 x edibility; Health = 1.125 x edibility).
config.PhoenixNHerbsSellValue.name: Phoenix 'n' Herbs Sell Value
config.PhoenixNHerbsSellValue.descriptio: How much Gunnar's Phoenix Down and Nine Herbs sell for.
config.OriginalColaSellValue.name: Original Cola Base Price
config.OriginalColaSellValue.description: How much it costs to buy original joja cola at the Bear Family's vending machine. This price is also affected by the Basement Cola Price Multiplier. Defaults to 25g to match vanilla sell value.
config.CustomColaSellValue.name: Custom Cola Sell Value
config.CustomColaSellValue.description: How much pumpkin and peach joja cola sells for.
config.BasementColaPriceMultiplier.name: Basement Cola Price Multiplier
config.BasementColaPriceMultiplier.descr: Multiplies the price of joja cola bought from the Bear Family's vending machine by this amount. Defaults to 3x to match vanilla joja cola pricing.
config.LuckierRemedyAll.name: +7 Luck Remedy All
config.LuckierRemedyAll.description: Toggling this on will change the Remedy All's buffs to +7 Luck.
config.OverrideRemedyAllPrice.name: Override Remedy All Price
config.OverrideRemedyAllPrice.descriptio: When toggled on, Remedy All will always cost 777g.
